abstract: Sebastián Eguren Ledesma (born 8 January 1981) is an Uruguayan professional footballer who plays for Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras in Brazil, mainly as a defensive midfielder.He started his career with Montevideo Wanderers, and went on to play professionally in Norway, Sweden, Spain, Paraguay and Brazil.Eguren gained nearly 60 caps with Uruguay, representing the country at the 2010 World Cup and two Copa América tournaments.
